org.apache.giraph.hive.output

类 SimpleVertexToHive<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

    所有已实现的接口:
    com.facebook.giraph.hive.schema.HiveTableSchemaAware, org.apache.giraph.conf.ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>, VertexToHive<I,V,E>

    public abstract class SimpleVertexToHive<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends AbstractVertexToHive<I,V,E>
    Simple implementation of VertexToHive when each Vertex is stored to one row in the output.

        public abstract void fillRecord(org.apache.giraph.graph.Vertex<I,V,E,?> vertex,
              com.facebook.giraph.hive.record.HiveWritableRecord record)

        record - HiveRecord to write to.

      • saveVertex

        public final void saveVertex(org.apache.giraph.graph.Vertex<I,V,E,?> vertex,
              com.facebook.giraph.hive.record.HiveRecord reusableRecord,
              HiveRecordSaver recordSaver)
                      throws IOException,
                             InterruptedException
        从接口复制的说明: VertexToHive
        Save vertex to the output. One vertex can be stored to multiple rows in the output. Record you get here is reusable, and the protocol to follow is: - fill the reusableRecord with your data - call recordSaver.save(reusableRecord) - repeat If you don't call save() at all then there won't be any output for this vertex.
        参数:
        vertex - Vertex which we want to save.
        reusableRecord - Record to use for writing data to it.
        recordSaver - Saver of records
        抛出:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
